lead_paragraph: A well-to-do Manhattan couple, outwardly affectionate, but in reality at each other's throats, realize their true love for each other when they are forced into hiding in an Amish community while ducking the IRS after failing to pay back taxes.
snippet: A well-to-do Manhattan couple, outwardly affectionate, but in reality at each other's throats, realize their true love for each other when they are forced into hiding in an Amish community while ducking the IRS after failing to pay back taxes.
